Visible.description: Set the visibility of the button.

OnPress.description: Action or rule to be performed when the event is triggered.

Title.description: Label to be displayed on the button. For Android, the text is always in upper case and cannot be styled to contain lower case letters.

Image.description: Image to be displayed in the ActionItem.

enum.description: Action that deletes data or performs some type of destructive task.
Action that cannot perform any operation.

ButtonType.description: Constants indicating the style information that is applied to the action button. iOS only.

Style.description: It supports font-color for the button. Android only.
